properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_REPORT ( RPT_NO , MEM_NO , RPT_MEM_NO , RPT_REASON_NO , RPT_REF_CAT , RPT_REF_NO , RPT_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_RPTNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , 2 , ? , SYSDATE )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REPORT WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND RPT_REF_NO = ? AND RPT_REF_CAT =2

SELECT R.RPT_REF_NO, R.RPT_REF_CAT, M.MEM_ID AS "RPT_MEM_ID" , DECODE (R.RPT_REF_CAT, 1, '후기', 2, '댓글') AS "CATEGORY" , COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" , NVL(RE.RV_STATUS, 'X') AS "RV_STATUS" , NVL(CO.COM_STATUS, 'X') AS "COM_STATUS" FROM TB_REPORT R JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (R.RPT_MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_REVIEW RE ON (R.RPT_REF_CAT = 1 AND R.RPT_REF_NO = RE.RV_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_COMMENT CO ON (R.RPT_REF_CAT = 2 AND R.RPT_REF_NO = CO.COM_NO)
GROUP BY R.RPT_REF_NO, R.RPT_REF_CAT, M.MEM_ID, RE.RV_STATUS, CO.COM_STATUS
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) AS "TODAY_REVIEW_COUNT" FROM TB_REPORT WHERE TO_CHAR(RPT_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') AND RPT_REF_CAT = '1'
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) AS "TOTAL_REVIEW_COUNT" FROM TB_REPORT WHERE RPT_REF_CAT = '1'
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) AS "TODAY_COMMENT_COUNT" FROM TB_REPORT WHERE TO_CHAR(RPT_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') AND RPT_REF_CAT = '2'
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) AS "TOTAL_COMMECT_COUNT" FROM TB_REPORT WHERE RPT_REF_CAT = '2'

SELECT MEM_ID FROM (SELECT RPT_MEM_NO FROM TB_REPORT GROUP BY RPT_MEM_NO HAVING COUNT(*) = (SELECT MAX(COUNT) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT", RPT_MEM_NO FROM TB_REPORT GROUP BY RPT_MEM_NO))) JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (RPT_MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO)
